name: our home (itch) (ghostinthegame)
description:
This is a game about YOU and HER.

You are trapped inside together. But it's alright, because you love each other. YOU will take care of HER, and SHE will take care of YOU. That's the way it's always been- and always will be.

So long as YOU keep up your end of the bargain...

Cook, clean, and tidy your shared space. Investigate your surroundings, and decide each day- will you leave, or will you stay?

---

2 Endings

Warning: Includes light horror elements and some elements which may portray emotionally abusive language.

---

Credits:

All art, sounds and writing by ghostinthegame.

Developed using RPGMaker MV.

All pixel art made using Aseprite.

Two tracks, "the house is full of cobwebs" and "something pink" were made using Garageband Studio.

All sounds, including those tracks, were edited using Audacity.

---

This game is complete, but still in development. Let us know if you find any bugs!
